Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the foundational systems requirements and brainstorm potential approaches for input handling and basic physics.
Set up the initial project structure in Unity, create necessary folders (Scripts, Assets, Scenes, etc.).
Initialize Git repository for the project and set up .gitignore for Unity. Push initial project structure to the remote repository.
Start implementing basic input handling system (keyboard/mouse controls). Test with simple character movement.
Continue refining input handling system. Add controller support if time permits.
Email @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 to request placeholder character models for testing physics. Include specifications for basic collision shapes.
Research and implement basic physics (gravity, collision detection) using Unity's Rigidbody components.
Test physics implementation with simple cubes as placeholders. Debug any issues.
